contextId.information: AT: "and both Israel and Judah followed him in his sin." Israel also includes Judah here. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]] )
AT: "Asa had all the shrines and altars that were used for worshiping false gods in Judah destroyed" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: he took away the high places and the incense altars from all the cities of Judah

contextId.information: Here "built up" means to build walls around a city so that the city can be defended from attackers. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
"he commanded his troops to stop fortifying Ramah and doing other work there. " (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
AT: "had been more careful to follow the rules for purifying themselves" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: had been more careful to consecrate themselves

contextId.information: AT: "as did the other people groups whom Yahweh caused to be defeated by the people of Israel." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: like the disgusting things of the nations whom Yahweh had driven out before the people of Israel

contextId.information: AT: "who took care of the priestly robes" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
